title: Prediction markets are Robinhood’s fastest-growing money maker
contentSnippet: Since Robinhood launched its prediction markets in March, nine billion contracts have been traded by more than one million users, according to the platform.

title: Crypto-friendly Trump adviser Hassett top pick for Fed chair: Report
contentSnippet: Kevin Hassett, who was central to the president’s crypto working group, has sprung up as a frontrunner to take over the Federal Reserve, Bloomberg reports.

title: XRP Tests Crucial $2.20 Pivot After $164M ETF Debut Fails to Offset Liquidations
contentSnippet: Traders should watch for ETF inflows and whale distributions to determine if the $2.20 support will hold.

title: Grayscale’s GDOG Debuts Quietly While DOGE Builds Higher Lows
contentSnippet: DOGE is in a bullish consolidation phase, with technical indicators suggesting potential for upward movement if resistance at $0.154 is surpassed.

title: Bitcoin looks red again this month, but demand may stir soon: Bitfinex
contentSnippet: Bitcoin has broken character for two consecutive months and now faces two possible paths: a resurgence in demand or a deeper accumulation phase.

title: Coinbase reveals 9 crypto ideas it wants to bankroll in 2026
contentSnippet: Coinbase Ventures outlined nine investment priorities for 2026, spanning RWA perpetuals, specialized exchanges, DeFi composability and AI-powered development tools.

title: Essential Bitcoin Price Points Traders Should Track Now
contentSnippet: Major moving averages on price charts are likely to act as key battlegrounds where bulls and bears fight for control.

title: Nevada Just Shattered Prediction Markets’ Favorite Theory in Kalshi Ruling
contentSnippet: Nevada’s ruling says sports outcome contracts on a federally regulated exchange are not swaps, opening the door for state gambling laws to apply.

title: Bitcoin final leverage flush below $80K is possible, warns analyst
contentSnippet: An analyst has warned that Bitcoin’s recent liquidation event may not be finished, with remaining leverage potentially pushing prices somewhere between the $70,000 to $80,000 zone.

title: Three Signals Bitcoin Options Traders Are Looking For to Time a 'Genuine Low'
contentSnippet: Options traders are signaling a capped Bitcoin rebound, with volatility gauges pointing to a range-bound 2025 rather than a year-end surge.

title: DeFi is already 30% of the way to mass adoption: Chainlink founder
contentSnippet: Chainlink’s Sergey Nazarov has shared a potential roadmap for how DeFi could reach 100% adoption in four years, noting that a big part of this hinges on regulation.

title: Texas buys the Bitcoin dip, acquiring $5M of BlackRock’s IBIT
contentSnippet: Texas has also allocated an additional $5 million for direct, self-custodied Bitcoin, signaling growing state-level adoption in the US.

title: ‘Institutions have arrived’ — US Bancorp launches stablecoin pilot on Stellar network
contentSnippet: The ability to freeze assets and unwind transactions was a key consideration when selecting the blockchain for the pilot, according to Mike Villano from US Bank.

title: Grayscale spot Dogecoin ETF falls under volume expectations on debut
contentSnippet: Trading volume on the debut of Grayscale's first US spot Dogecoin ETF came in under an analyst’s expectation, with Bitwise soon to launch its own fund.

title: Monad Hit With Spoofed Token Transfers Days After Mainnet Launch
contentSnippet: Fake ERC-20 transfers appeared within 48 hours of MON’s debut as attackers targeted users during the network’s first wave of activity.

title: JPMorgan's Bitcoin Structured Notes Offer Potentially Massive Returns—If BTC Surges by 2028
contentSnippet: The bank has an idea for a product that would allow investors to make big gains if the leading cryptocurrency soars.

title: Asia Morning Briefing: Asia Wakes Up to an AI BTC-Nvidia Tailwind That’s Already Starting to Sputter
contentSnippet: Yesterday’s Amazon-driven risk rally is colliding with a sharp wobble in Nvidia, putting the AI-BTC-beta trade that lifted crypto back under scrutiny.

title: Saudi Arabia's First Quantum Computer: Can It Break Bitcoin?
contentSnippet: Saudi Arabia has deployed its first quantum computer, renewing questions about the future of blockchain security.

title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
contentSnippet: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

title: Monad Rises After Airdrop While Bitcoin and Ethereum Droop
contentSnippet: The price of Monad’s native cryptocurrency rose on Tuesday, following an anticipated airdrop that initially underwhelmed some speculators.

title: Bitwise Dogecoin ETF Debut Imminent After Quiet Start for Grayscale DOGE Fund
contentSnippet: Bitwise's Dogecoin ETF, BWOW, was certified by NYSE Arca, signaling investors will soon be able to start trading the meme coin fund.

title: Texas Buys $5M in BTC ETF as States Edge Toward First Government Crypto Reserves
contentSnippet: The effort is starting small, but Texas made an opening foray into a state-based crypto reserve — getting closer to the first government stockpile in the U.S.

title: US Bank Is Testing a Stablecoin on Stellar Network
contentSnippet: U.S. Bank joins the growing list of traditional banking institutions working on stablecoins, testing its own on the Stellar blockchain.

title: MoonPay Granted New York Trust Charter, Joining Coinbase and Ripple
contentSnippet: Crypto payments firm MoonPay has gained regulatory approval in New York to safeguard customers’ digital assets and facilitate OTC trades.

title: Kraken Launches Bitcoin Rewards Debit Mastercard Ahead of Planned IPO
contentSnippet: Kraken unveiled a Bitcoin rewards Mastercard debit card that links to its peer-to-peer payments app, Krak.

title: Polymarket Set for US Return Following Approval From CFTC
contentSnippet: The popular prediction market says it now has permission to directly onboard U.S. customers, brokerages, and market intermediaries.

title: Stellar Rallies 2.3% Breaking Key Resistance on Volume Surge
contentSnippet: Stellar breaks through critical $0.2460 level as institutional flows drive measured accumulation above seven-day averages.

title: U.S. Crypto Regulator, CFTC, Seeking Names for New 'CEO Innovation Council'
contentSnippet: Acting Chairman Caroline Pham said the group will help usher in a new era of market structure, including a focus on digital assets.

title: Filecoin Spikes 9% as Downtrend Breaks
contentSnippet: The strong price action occurred on below-average volume.

title: U.S Bank Tests Custom Stablecoin Issuance on Stellar Network
contentSnippet: The nation's fifth-largest commercial bank explores how a bank can issue stablecoins on a public blockchain.

title: 新たなICOプラットフォームとして注目を集めるStellar社に独占インタビュー
contentSnippet: 最近いくつかのスタートアップ企業がICOでStellarネットワークを利用し始めています。Lumenトークンの流動性を増やすべく、Stellar社は取引所への新規上場や、企業とのパートナーシップの強化に力を注いでいます。
